org.codice.ddf.configuration.migration

Class AccessUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.configuration.migration.AccessUtils

  • public class AccessUtils
extends Object
    Utility classes to help with the access controller.

    • Method Detail

      • doPrivileged

        public static <T,E extends Exception> T doPrivileged(ThrowingSupplier<T,E> action)
                                              throws E extends Exception
        Performs the specified action with privileges enabled. The action is performed with all of the permissions possessed by this class' (or by the migration framework's) protection domain.

        If the action's ThrowingSupplier.get() method throws an unchecked exception, it will propagate through this method.

        Note: Any DomainCombiner associated with the current AccessControlContext will be ignored while the action is performed.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the value returned by the action
        E - the type of exceptions thrown by the action
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed
        Returns:
        the value returned by the action's run method
        Throws:
        E - if the specified action's threw the exception
        IllegalArgumentException - if action is null
        E extends Exception

      • doConditionallyPrivileged

        public static <T,E extends Exception> T doConditionallyPrivileged(boolean condition,
                                                                  ThrowingSupplier<T,E> action)
                                                           throws E extends Exception
        Performs the specified action with privileges enabled if the specified condition is true . The action is performed with all of the permissions possessed by this class' (or by the migration framework's) protection domain. Otherwise performs the specified action using the caller's permissions.

        If the action's ThrowingSupplier.get() method throws an unchecked exception, it will propagate through this method.

        Note: Any DomainCombiner associated with the current AccessControlContext will be ignored while the action is performed.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the value returned by the action
        E - the type of exceptions thrown by the action
        Parameters:
        condition - true to perform the action with the permissions possessed by this class; false to use the caller's permissions
        action - the action to be performed
        Returns:
        the value returned by the action's run method
        Throws:
        E - if the specified action's threw the exception
        IllegalArgumentException - if action is null
        E extends Exception

      • doPrivileged

        public static <E extends Exception> void doPrivileged(ThrowingRunnable<E> action)
                                               throws E extends Exception
        Performs the specified action with privileges enabled. The action is performed with all of the permissions possessed by this class' (or by the migration framework's) protection domain.

        If the action's ThrowingSupplier.get() method throws an unchecked exception, it will propagate through this method.

        Note: Any DomainCombiner associated with the current AccessControlContext will be ignored while the action is performed.

        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of exceptions thrown by the action
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed
        Throws:
        E - if the specified action's threw the exception
        IllegalArgumentException - if action is null
        E extends Exception

      • doConditionallyPrivileged

        public static <E extends Exception> void doConditionallyPrivileged(boolean condition,
                                                                   ThrowingRunnable<E> action)
                                                            throws E extends Exception
        Performs the specified action with privileges enabled if the specified condition is true . The action is performed with all of the permissions possessed by this class' (or by the migration framework's) protection domain. Otherwise performs the specified action using the caller's permissions.

        If the action's ThrowingSupplier.get() method throws an unchecked exception, it will propagate through this method.

        Note: Any DomainCombiner associated with the current AccessControlContext will be ignored while the action is performed.

        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of exceptions thrown by the action
        Parameters:
        condition - true to perform the action with the permissions possessed by this class; false to use the caller's permissions
        action - the action to be performed
        Throws:
        E - if the specified action's threw the exception
        IllegalArgumentException - if action is null
        E extends Exception
